name: Dark Zone - Beta
description:
Dark Zone is a first person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world where a highly deadly virus wiped out part of the world's population, our mission is to clean up areas where the infection got out of control.

You will be part of a group of mercenaries immune to the virus willing to risk their lives for money and supplies, in each level you will get new challenges and enemies that will test your survival skills.

Within this beta version you will be able to play with 4 types of weapons, this list will be updated when the final version of the game is released:

  1. Shotgun
  2. Assault rifle
  3. Pistol
  4. Subfusil 

The idea of the game is that it has 6 levels in its final version and each level has 5 sublevels, in this installment you will only have 1 level and 3 sublevels at your fingertips, but don't worry that all the content will be available very soon.

Dark Zone is currently under development and I am doing my best to deliver the full version as soon as possible, I am an independent developer and I love my job, I am working alone on this project and I would like to read your comments and ideas.

I would really appreciate your feedback through this questionnaire: Your Opinions

Or you can contact me directly at the following email: globalsoft2013@gmail.com
